title: Flower stories
creator_credit: Kate Canning, Terry Harding, Richard Price Television, Taurus-Film and HTV West
brief_description: A compilation of 8 animated stories aimed to entertain children aged between 3-9 years and featuring James, a fat black and white cat. The central theme for all the stories is “flowers”. Very colorful! Animation by Sue Allen. Storyteller: Alan Taylor.
